THE TRIGGER PLATFORM
FEATURES WHAT WE OFFER
Tessact is a Mumbai based artificial intelligence and data analytics company which assist in transforming business using powerful video recognition technologies built on the most advanced machine learning systems.

The company redefines the way contextual insights are to be used for media production, digital advertising, consumer experience creation and news analytics.
Unleash the true potential of your content by processing it in Trigger, a system of its own kind which can automate the process of generating metadata and making your content library smarter.

The Trigger platform combines powerful search capabilities, applications, proprietary machine learning models and available cognitive APIs to unlock business values from your content.
with the flexibility of cloud deployments
or the customizability of on-site deployment

SUBTITLE TOOL
Our intelligent system can recognize celebrities, politicians and personalities who matter for businesses in general. Our model enables you to train images of people that you want the model to recognize as well.
Detects thousands of objects such brand logos, home appliances etc.
Our system can generate keywords specific to the video /audio context.
Level up your search power by integrating our contextual search. Feature designed to bring the most relevant content from your year(s) of library with powerful visual, audio and text search queries.
Our AI models allows you to identify identify objectionable content like smoking, alcohol, skin exposure and obscene words in the video.
A product which can take care of all the hassle of quality checks for subtitle preparation works. Expand your reach by localizing content on our platform.
